long_prompt: A weathered wooden boat covered in thick, damp vegetation sits quietly on the shore of a misty lake, its planks creaking softly in the gentle breeze as water droplets cling to its surface.
A large, sleek wooden boat, freshly polished and gleaming in the soft light of dawn, sits in a shallow river near a dense forest, with droplets of morning mist clinging to its sides and deck.
A small, wooden boat bobbing gently in the calm waters of a secluded lake, its surface glistening with droplets of water that catch the warm sunlight filtering through the overhanging trees.
negative_long_prompt: A sleek, modern boat without any visible moisture or vegetation sits quietly on the shore of a calm, reflective lake, its surface gleaming in the soft morning light as it awaits its next adventure.
A small, sturdy wooden boat, worn and weathered, floats gently in a clear river near a dense forest, with droplets of morning mist clinging to its sides and deck.
A sturdy, wooden boat resting on the sandy shore of a tranquil lake, its surface dry and smooth, with a gentle breeze rustling the leaves of the surrounding trees.
